::Slayer/Perndabot::

Slayer barely had a second's warning as shots erupted from the water, 
heading up toward him. He swears, barely avoiding them and firing two 
missiles at the place that they had come from.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot checks his scanners and then replies to Darkfate's 
comm. "No, that ain't one of ours," he says, landing at the Iron Fist 
and entering to report to FZ.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Darkfate/Chamaleon/Blackfortress's Defences::
> 
> Chamaleon recived information of the main computer, one of 
Darkfate's

> Underwater's exit. He told it to Darkfate by comm link.
> 
> "I hope that this singnarure don't belong to any of Alliance or 
> Alliance's allies" said Darkfate to Perndabot while he sent 
Slayer's 
> signature by comm link "Because I'll open fire... now"
> 
> 
> The Cannons close to Underwater exit appeared and shot Slayer.
> 
> Darkfate send a secret menssage to chamaleon "Free them"
